BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 010381 PPM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter concerning the disposition of one city-owned property, located between Marginal Street,Wharf or Place at East 20th and East 23rd streets, Borough of Manhattan, in Council District no. 4.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Property located at E 20th St, Manhattan, (C010381PPM)

Items.Title: Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. 010382 ZMM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 4.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Zoning map changes CD #4, Manhattan (010382ZMM)

Items.Title: Application no. 20025039 HAK, an Urban Development Action Area Project, located at 429 Bergen Street/43-45 Fifth Avenue, Council District no. 33, Borough of Brooklyn.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law, at the request of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development.
